Topic.Title: Need help retrieving my registration key...

Posts.EditableText: I've emailed the alex@axeuk.com address multiple times requesting my registration code be resent to me and have recieved no response. I was hoping a moderator could assist me with contacting someone who can help. I had to reformat my hard drive in December due to issues with spyware/virii and forgot to save the registration code.

Posts.EditableText: I don't have any record of your email address, and I can't see any emails from you in my inbox either. Can you please drop me an email and let me know as much as you can about your order, such as approximate date, email address you used when ordering, postal address etc.?
